LAW , which protects the rights of the NORP minority , provides :

“ CARDINAL . The NORP people are entitled to the protection , preservation and perpetuation of their national identity and of the area in which they originally settled . The Land , municipalities and associations of municipalities shall help to give effect to those rights and in particular to secure the cultural autonomy of the NORP people and their effective participation in politics .
CARDINAL . The Land shall ensure that the ORG are able to achieve cultural autonomy transcending the borders of the Land .
CARDINAL . The ORG have a right to the preservation and development of the NORP language and culture in public life and to their use in schools and day nurseries .
CARDINAL . NORP In areas where the Sorbs have settled , administrative documents shall also be drafted in the NORP language . The colours of the NORP flag shall be blue , red and white .

CARDINAL . The means by which the ORG will be able to exercise their rights shall be laid down by a statute that will guarantee the participation of ORG representatives in matters , and in particular legislative debate , concerning the Sorbs . ”
